15532211222121111112112.content:
Naruto grinned slyly as he sat back up and clutched his bloated Shikamaru-filled stomach. "Oh, wait wait! I feel a big one coming..." he said, before bopping his head forward and letting out another huge burp. When it was over, he smiled smugly, but you just smirk, only half impressed. "That was cute, now lemme show you how it's REALLY done," you reply before gripping your own bloated gut firmly for a second before pressing hard and forcing out an even more titanic belch, right in Naruto's direction.

Agan, Naruto burst into a fit of laughter as you smirked and patted your stomach proudly. "Holy crap, man!" Naruto said, between pouts of laughter, "I didn't even know you could burp like that!" You smile again and say, "There's a lot you probably don't know about me." Naruto grinned and said, "Heh, I bet." His grin grew more cocky. "But don't get cocky. You've got skill, but I'm still the king." With that, he took several gulps of air, causing his already bloated belly to expand just slightly as he winced a bit with discomfort. Pressing down on his gut with both hands, Naruto let out an explosively loud and lengthy belch. When it was over, he wiped his mouth with his forearm and grinned toothily. You gave him a mock bow, admittedly impressed. "Alright, guess I have to actually try now," you say.

The next few moments, both you and Naruto exchange belch for belch, each one getting progressively louder and longer as birds fly off in the distance to escape the noise.

Finally, one of you feels a contest winner brewing...

choices: Konohamaru and Udon as a pair of appetizers
Help Naruto eat Choji so he can share the same fate as Shikamaru
1553221122212111111211211.content:
Now that your bellies had finally gotten to work on your first pair of meals, you and Naruto decided to lay back and relax, letting your stomachs finish the job, occasionally working up a few small burps here and there from the two of you. "Ahhh, that was fun," Naruto exclaimed, wiping his mouth with his forearm. Chuckling yourself, you nudge him in the shoulder. "To be fair, you definitely gave me a run for my money," you say. Naruto laughs. "Don't worry, next time I'll mop the FLOOR with you!" He says, before unzipping his jacket and letting his belly spill over onto his lap.

"Man, never in a million years would I have thought eating people could feel so damn GOOD..." Naruto exclaimed, caressing his churning bare stomach with both hands. You simply nod in agreement and rub your own bloated gut slowly with one hand. "Mmhmm. And it's more than just feeling unbelievably stuffed," you start to say. "Just feeling them thrash around in your stomach like that...it's almost like getting an inner body massage...only...much...much better..." Naruto smacks his lips fondly. "So Kiba wasn't your first?" You shake your head. "I started with a few enemy ninjas on mission. First one happened on accident. Wasn't even by choice. He created a shadow clone and it forced itself down my throat...thinking that would kill me." Naruto smiled toothily. "Bet he didn't think you'd like it."

"Not by a long shot" you responded, licking your lips, as if still getting tasting that ninja from before. "After that, I did the same to the ninjas themselves...and they tasted so good that...well...nothing else could ever top them..." Your finger draws near your lower abdomen as you begin to trace circles around your bellybutton, smiling blissfully as your stomach continues to churn and gurgle as it continues to digest tirelessly. Naruto watches you for a moment, then glances down at his own churning belly and grips the side of it gently. "I think I'm starting to see what you mean."

Some more time passes. Both your stomachs shrink considerably as a result. Naruto behind some bushes to relieve himself while you go behind another bush much further away and do the same. After it passes, you clean up and wash up with a nearby public rinse, and sigh with immense relief, patting your once again flat stomach. "Jeez, hurry it up, Naruto! Kiba didn't take anywhere near as long, as he was FULL!"

After some time, Naruto finally cleans up and emerges, his own stomach once again flat as well. Zipping his pants back up, he pounds his fist into his chest and forces up a loud burp, grinning after. "Haha, go figure. Only a lazy-ass like Shikamaru would take THAT long to pass," Naruto exclaims, causing you to laugh, before your stomach roars hungrily. Naruto's own stomach groans audibly as well. Placing a hand atop it, he grins toothily back to you. "Whelp, I dunno about you, but I could definitely go for some seconds right about now."

Licking your own lips in agreement, you nod and decide on your next meals...

Damn, all that moving around was doing a damn number on my gut," Naruto exclaims, burping again. Your gut churns in agreement, forcing you to let out another huge burp yourself. Seeing his shirt getting strained and stretched from the much added girth of his Konohamaru and ramen gorging, Naruto pulls it off completely and just plops against his couch, too stuffed to even make it up to his bedroom. With a great sigh, you plop down on his couch next to him, almost making the couch creek beneath the pressure of the two of you and your immensely heavy meals. The two of you sit there, groaning and burping, caressing your bellies with both hands as they begin to tirelessly digest your heavy meals. Naruto's own belly especially was noticeably more bloated than yours and churning even more wickedly as it strained to work off his particularly massive meal. Seeing him grimace and groan in discomfort, you think for a moment for a solution to ease his bellyache...

You each occupy a separate bathroom to relieve yourselves. Fanning the air around your noise, you laugh and flush them down before cleaning and washing up, and heading back outside. This time, Naruto's already done and waiting. "Phew, boy did I need that!" Naruto exclaims, patting his once again thin stomach with relief. He then reaches for his t-shirt, but you say, "Do you really need that? You said it yourself, you wanna see your meals thrashing about in your gut, right?" you then smile a bit and add, "besides, you got a hell of a body. Don't be afraid to show it off." Naruto grinned smugly and flexed, "Like what'cha see, huh?" You simply laugh and nod. "Ah, what the hell," he replies, tossing his shirt back before grinning and adding, "still not as weird as the half shirts you wear."
